channel.title: Martin Kettle on Transcripts of Iriss.fm
channel.description: Recent content in Martin Kettle on Transcripts of Iriss.fm

item.title: Building the future; shaping our social work identity
item.description: MK - Martin Kettle Building the future: shaping our social work identity newly qualified social worker conference was held on 31 May 2018 in Edinburgh. Delivered with the University of Edinburgh (in partnership with the Higher Education Heads of Social Work Group), Iriss, Scottish Social Services Council, the Scottish Association of Social Work, Social Work Scotland and the Scottish Government, it provided an opportunity for newly qualified social workers to come together to connect and reconnect.

item.title: Perceptions of social work education and practice
